page.title: 18A GAME OF FRENCH SKIPPING
page.content: First you have to have about 3m. of elastic and tie one end of the elastic to the other. After that you have to have at least three people. Two people stand inside the elastic loop and the third one has to jump in and out of the loop. If you tread on the elastic you are out and another person has a go. There are different sayings for jumping to. One is:{"W.H.A.M. spells {WHAM!"}This is the name of one of the best pop groups. Another saying is:{"Grange Hill goes wild",}"Grange Hill" being the name of a Comprehension School in a television programme. You can make the game harder by altering the height of the elastic. This game is usually played by girls.
